select nvl(max(event_num), 0)+1 from event

mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, event_num, mem_key, title, content, event_date, event_start, event_end, event_room, event_pic from event) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end} order by event_date
